verses.name: Psalms 140:1
verses.text: Deliver me, O Lord, from the evil man: preserve me from the violent man;

verses.name: Psalms 140:2
verses.text: Which imagine mischiefs in their heart; continually are they gathered together for war.

verses.name: Psalms 140:3
verses.text: They have sharpened their tongues like a serpent; adders’ poison is under their lips. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 140:4
verses.text: Keep me, O Lord, from the hands of the wicked; preserve me from the violent man; who have purposed to overthrow my goings.

verses.name: Psalms 140:5
verses.text: The proud have hid a snare for me, and cords; they have spread a net by the wayside; they have set gins for me. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 140:6
verses.text: I said unto the Lord, Thou art my God: hear the voice of my supplications, O Lord.

verses.name: Psalms 140:7
verses.text: O God the Lord, the strength of my salvation, thou hast covered my head in the day of battle.

verses.name: Psalms 140:8
verses.text: Grant not, O Lord, the desires of the wicked: further not his wicked device; lest they exalt themselves. Selah.

verses.name: Psalms 140:9
verses.text: As for the head of those that compass me about, let the mischief of their own lips cover them.

verses.name: Psalms 140:10
verses.text: Let burning coals fall upon them: let them be cast into the fire; into deep pits, that they rise not up again.

verses.name: Psalms 140:11
verses.text: Let not an evil speaker be established in the earth: evil shall hunt the violent man to overthrow him.

verses.name: Psalms 140:12
verses.text: I know that the Lord will maintain the cause of the afflicted, and the right of the poor.

verses.name: Psalms 140:13
verses.text: Surely the righteous shall give thanks unto thy name: the upright shall dwell in thy presence.
